properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River; Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 12:41PM EST until January 9 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds to 30 knots and waves 10 to 13 feet expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Sodus Bay to
the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM EST THURSDAY
